title: Did Sasha borrow Michelle Obama’s Valentine’s date night earrings for NBA game?
summary_full: Former President Barack Obama, Michelle Obama and daughter Sasha made a rare family appearance at the 2026 NBA All-Star Game. Their Valentine's weekend outing blended romance and family connection, drawing significant attention. Sasha's presence, a departure from her childhood in the spotlight, highlighted generational transition and public affection, making the event a viral sensation.
